text: (Hera)! Savadhana rahanu je jati akasaharu ra prthvima cha, sabai allaha kai ho. Juna (avasthama) timi chau, tyo usala'i ramrari thaha cha ra juna dina manisaharu usatira pharka'inechan, ta uniharule jejati gardachan tyasabare usale uniharula'i avagata gara'une cha ra allaha pratyeka kura jandacha
